enigma.name: Tough Bark
enigma.obtain: Clicking on the tree with 20 Muted Bark.

enigma.name: Next to Enigma
enigma.obtain: Found in the lake in Enigma's Crib. It's mainly an example soul.

enigma.name: Woods Flower Pot
enigma.obtain: You must right click and following each of the flower pots in the Wyld Woods first.

enigma.name: Wither Cage
enigma.obtain: Can be obtained by right-clicking on the nearby rotated wither skeleton skull.

enigma.name: Pressurized
enigma.obtain: Underneath a body of water that launches you upwards when you swim under it, but this can be bypassed by jumping into it from a high place.

enigma.name: Two Plates
enigma.obtain: Requires two players standing on both adjacent stone pressure plates.

enigma.name: Fleespook
enigma.obtain: Can be reached by following the Fleespook and climbing specific trees in the Wyld Woods.

enigma.name: Up in the Sky
enigma.obtain: Reached by jumping on the launch pad.

enigma.name: Between Branches
enigma.obtain: In a floating glass block, which can be reached by placing 2 Larva Silk and using a Silkwire Stick.

enigma.name: Tel Kar
enigma.obtain: Unlocked by fully speaking to Tel Kar, which requires at least 2m30s Rift Time.

enigma.name: Lagoon Cave
enigma.obtain: Found at the end of the parkour course.

enigma.name: Mushroom Guy
enigma.obtain: Found on a tree near Mushroom Guy.

enigma.name: Roy
enigma.obtain: Can be purchased from Roy for 4,000 Motes and 8 Deadgehog Spines.

enigma.name: Spinning Runes
enigma.obtain: Obtainable by making 5 spinning runes face the tree the soul is in. Clicking on a rune makes it and the 2 surrounding runes spin in the same direction.

enigma.name: Hot Dog Contest
enigma.obtain: Can be obtained by feeding 50 Hot Dogs to Joey McPizza after speaking to Chef.

enigma.name: Fake Neuroscience
enigma.obtain: Requires a Key To Infested House Soul from Kat.

enigma.name: 2 Players Soul
enigma.obtain: Requires two players, where one player has to tell the other player which slots to click in a menu.

enigma.name: Cake House #1
enigma.obtain: Requires you to eat through a lot cake.

enigma.name: Cake House #2
enigma.obtain: Requires you to eat through a lot cake.

enigma.name: Dolphin Parkour
enigma.obtain: You must speak to Cosmo in the West Village and enter the Dolphin Trainer, then swim in the water like a dolphin.

enigma.name: Between Roofs
enigma.obtain: In a floating glass block, which can be reached by placing 2 Larva Silk and using a Silkwire Stick.

enigma.name: Farm Flower Pot
enigma.obtain: Can be reached by clicking and following flower pots, with the last one launching you to the windmill.

enigma.name: Beanstalk
enigma.obtain: Can be reached by fully growing the Great Beanstalk with the Plumber's Bucket.

enigma.name: Buttons
enigma.obtain: Obtainable by shooting all 56 wooden buttons in the West Village with the Berberis Blowgun and then going to Sorcerer Okron's house.

enigma.name: Farm Balloons
enigma.obtain: Unlocked by shooting down balloons with the Berberis Blowgun.

enigma.name: Rabbit in the Hat!
enigma.obtain: Unlocked by leading one of Cowboy Nick's rabbits underneath the nearby floating yellow hat.

enigma.name: Back to Basics
enigma.obtain: Can be found by bridging across the gap with Tree-like Wool.

enigma.name: Buy BZT Today
enigma.obtain: Can be purchased from Cryptosis for 15,000 Motes and 10 Scribe Cruxes.

enigma.name: Plaza Fleespook
enigma.obtain: Reached by following the Fleespook to the top of Barrier Street.

enigma.name: Plaza Balloons
enigma.obtain: Unlocked by shooting down balloons near the Village Plaza with the Berberis Blowgun.

enigma.name: Lonely Ävaeìkx
enigma.obtain: Can be obtained by sitting in the chairs next to Lonely Ävaeìkx for at least 3 minutes.

enigma.name: Between Cooler Roofs
enigma.obtain: In a floating glass block, which can be reached by placing 2 Larva Silk and using a Silkwire Stick.

enigma.name: Horsing Around
enigma.obtain: The surrounding Hay Bales can be destroyed with the Horsezooka.

enigma.name: Behind a Living Wall
enigma.obtain: Found behind a cracked stone brick wall, which can be destroyed with a Horsezooka.

enigma.name: Flowery Message
enigma.obtain: Obtainable by saying "Hi" in chat after clicking and following a series of flower pots.

enigma.name: Full Circle
enigma.obtain: Claimable by speaking to Mole and then jumping across all the Colosseum pillars.

enigma.name: Standing there
enigma.obtain: Found in a hidden cave around the cliffside.

enigma.name: Between Towers
enigma.obtain: In a floating glass block, which can be reached by placing 2 Larva Silk and using a Silkwire Stick.

enigma.name: Castle Fleespook
enigma.obtain: Can be obtained by following the Fleespook up the trees.

enigma.name: Castle Flower Pot
enigma.obtain: Claimable by following and right-clicking a trail of flower pots.

enigma.name: Castle Balloons
enigma.obtain: Unlocked by shooting down balloons with the Berberis Blowgun.

enigma.name: Fairylosopher
enigma.obtain: Can be purchased from the highest Fairylosopher for 10,000 Motes and 32 Splatter Cruxes.
